Workflow states are statuses unique to a specific workflow.

::: {.callout}
Workflow states are discrete from model stages.^[[Manage model stages](/guide/workflows/manage-model-stages.qmd)]
:::

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] Workflows exist for states to be tied to.[^1]
- [x] You are a [{{< fa hand >}} Customer Admin]{.bubble} or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^2]

:::
